title: Taken from the Winter King
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B07XN6D2H4A bond she’s rejectedA mate he’s desperate to find.A curse that’s killed the land—and only they can break it.Mara’s tired of being kidnapped. First the Winter King comes and hauls her off to his palace. Now two small fae have taken her captive and won’t say why. With no money, no magic, and nothing to bargain, Mara has to find a way to escape them and get out of Faerie—lest the King find her first.Vareck’s waited 600 years for her, and just when he turns his back, she’s stolen from his very chambers. Desperate to find his mate and rescue her from the devious fae that took her, the Winter King follows her scent and journeys into the depths of winter.But not even in his wildest imagination did Vareck expect to find his mate walking out of a tavern in the arms of a leprechaun.What’s worse?She’s covered in Faerie Dust—the most potent aphrodisiac known to fae.
author: Ariel Hunter
